item.title: Ansible - Infrastructure as Code
item.description: Configuration You can configure ansible through ansible configuration variables, there are two ways to change the value of ansible configuration variables Environment variables ini file named ansible.cfg Ansible configuration variable value are manage in below order 1. ANSIBLE_CONFIG (environment variable if set) 2. ansible.cfg (in the current directory) 3. ~/.ansible.cfg (in the home directory) 4. /etc/ansible/ansible.cfg Structure of ansible.cfg file [defaults] inventory = ./inventory In INI format file Both the hash sign (#) and semicolon (;) are allowed as comment markers
